alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...GUST FRONT WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF HUDSON, UNION, SOUTHEASTERN ESSEX, QUEENS, RICHMOND, KINGS, NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) AND SOUTHERN NASSAU COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front along a line extending from Laguardia Airport to Bensonhurst to Tottenville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, Elizabeth, Flatbush, Bayonne, Hoboken, Plainfield, Freeport, Linden, Valley Stream, Long Beach, Coney Island, Lyndhurst and Lynbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
